name: central_sample_id
description: Centrally assigned barcode

name: adm1
description: The administrative region

name: received_date
description: The date the sample was received. Required if collection date not available

name: collection_date
description: The date the sample was collected

name: source_age
description: Age of patient in years

name: source_sex
description: Sex of the patient

name: is_surveillance
description: Is this sample one chosen according to the surveillance sampling strategy?

name: is_hcw
description: Is the sample from a healthcare worker?

name: employing_hospital_name
description: If a HCW, the name of the hospital

name: employing_hospital_trust_or_board
description: If a HCW, the name of hospital trust (in England) or hospital organisation

name: is_hospital_patient
description: Is the sample from a patient in the hospital?

name: admitted_with_covid_diagnosis
description: Was the patient in admitted to hospital with a positive diagnosis for covid?

name: admission_date
description: The date the patient was admitted to hospital

name: admitted_hospital_name
description: If a hospital patient, the name of the hospital

name: admitted_hospital_trust_or_board
description: If a hospital patient, the name of hospital trust (in England) or hospital organisation

name: is_care_home_worker
description: Is the sample from a care home worker?

name: is_care_home_resident
description: Is the sample from a care home resident?

name: anonymised_care_home_code
description: A code identifying the care home but which does not contain any identifying information about the care home, e.g. 'A'

name: adm2
description: The county that the patient lives in (no abbreviations or short hand)

name: adm2_private
description: The outer postcode for the patientâ€™s home address (first half of the postcode only)

name: biosample_source_id
description: Unique identifier of patient or environmental sample. Do not use an NHS number here

name: root_sample_id
description: Identifier assigned to this sample from one of the health agencies

name: sender_sample_id
description: Id only if renamed on receipt, otherwise leave blank

name: collecting_org
description: The site where the sample was collected (eg. hospital or surgery)

name: sample_type_collected
description: Sample type collected

name: sample_type_received
description: Sample type received

name: swab_site
description: Swab site

name: epi_cluster
description: Identifier for an epidemiological cluster

name: investigation_name
description: A named investigation (eg. a surveillance or directed case group)

name: investigation_site
description: An optional site name (likely to be the same as collecting_org) to distinguish cases between sites if the investigation covers more than one site

name: investigation_cluster
description: An optional identifier for a cluster within an investigation

name: ct_1_ct_value
description: Ct value for samples (test 1)

name: ct_1_test_target
description: The target for the qPCR test (test 1)

name: ct_1_test_platform
description: The platform used for the qPCR tes (test 1)

name: ct_1_test_kit
description: The kit used for the qPCR test (test 1)

name: ct_2_ct_value
description: Ct value for samples (test 2)

name: ct_2_test_target
description: The target for the qPCR test (test 2)

name: ct_2_test_platform
description: The platform used for the qPCR test (test 2)

name: ct_2_test_kit
description: The kit used for the qPCR test (test 2)

name: library_name
description: Library name

name: library_seq_kit
description: Library kit

name: library_seq_protocol
description: Library protocol

name: library_layout_config
description: Library configuration

name: library_selection
description: Library selection

name: library_source
description: Library source

name: library_strategy
description: Library strategy

name: library_layout_insert_length
description: Insert length

name: library_layout_read_length
description: Read Length

name: barcode
description: Sequencing Barcode

name: artic_primers
description: The version of primers used: 1 2 or 3

name: artic_protocol
description: The version of the lab protocol used

name: run_name
description: Run Name

name: instrument_make
description: Instrument make

name: instrument_model
description: Instrument model

name: start_time
description: Sequencing run start time

name: end_time
description: Sequencing run end time

name: flowcell_id
description: Flowcell id

name: flowcell_type
description: Flow cell type
